name: The New WASD
description:
In this little game you control Key, a key from an old keyboard.

The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by dodging the water droplets and adapting to the game controls that change every 6 seconds, becoming harder and harder as the time passes. You will start using WASD to move, but half a minute later that may have changed to Z3O and the spacebar.

We put a lot of emphasis on the sound design of the game, that features a short track which changes every time your controls change, as well as very pleasant keyboard presses with every input.

The game also features progressive difficulty, making droplets spawn at higher rates and with faster speeds as time passes.

Made by Javier Víctor Díaz Salazar, Álvaro Lozano Gil and Jia Yun Liu.

Credits to Vilkas Sound - Free Music & SFX for the title menu music.
